DOC.brief_summary: Implantation of fiducial markers in the prostate and daily check of the positioning during radiotherapy based on the implanted fiducial markers
DOC.brief_title: The Implantation Under Echography of Fiducial Markers in the Intraprostatic Lesion and Prostate
DOC.criteria: histological proven adenocarcinoma of the prostate T1T4 tumors Radiotherapy as primary therapy +/ androgen deprivation Presence of an intraprostatic lesion (IPL) on MRI/MRS Presence of an intraprostatic lesion (IPL) on ultrasound WHO 02 Other primary tumor, except nonmelanoma skin cancer No written informed consent
